data.text: We arrived late to Barcelona. The free hotel shuttle picked us up as expected and on time. Check in was pleasant, even with tired kids, and the room was great - clean, spacious enough and we had a cool room configuration - a king bed and 2 twin bunk beds - perfect for our family. The staff was friendly, including the bartender downstairs.  Great service - they went above and beyond to return my AirPods that I left behind in the room - housekeeping found my headphones and the hotel mailed them back to the U.S. for me! No fuss, no upcharge, nothing. I provided my credit card and shipping was $11 USD. Great experience, nice amenities, clean and super service!
data.title: Great 1 night stay, staff went above and beyond too!

data.text:
We just had a brief one night stay before a flight the next morning, but it was a great place.  Mahfud, who checked us in, was super nice and gave us a free upgrade and a couple of vouchers for a drink at the bar, which was open late.  The free shuttle to the airport worked out great.

The only strange thing about the room is that there was no door between the bathroom and the rest of the room, so anybody using the toilet was exposed.  I'm not sure if every room is like that or just ours, but something to think about if you are staying with somebody that you may not have that kind of relationship with.
data.title: Very friendly staff, nice place to stay before a flight

data.text:
Lovely boutique hotel. Great service, especially Mahfud on the front desk.
He was a realhelp at checkout, I have a bad knee.
I had an appetizer platter for dinner the prior night, with Iberian ham on toasted crusty rolls with tomato â€¦!very nice.
Plus a delicious vodkas sour.
data.title: Preflight Stay.

data.text: Clean but in an industrial area about 7 kilometre from airport. Parking is extra. Nothing of any interest nearby. Bathroom was clean and modern, beds comfortable and hotel quiet. More for the businessman. Just used it to stay prior to flight out and that we had to return our car to the airport. If we didn't have an early flight and car return we would have stayed in the city centre.
data.title: An airport hotel but not at the airport.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for taking the time to share your past experience with us and for choosing our property as your desired hotel destination.

Due to having our location very close to Barcelona Airport, we wanted to provide a free shuttle service to our guests as a courtesy to help with their transportation requirements.

The hotel is connected to the city center by public bus and metro and we are only two stops from the Barcelona Trade Fairs. The Mercabarna (largest wholesale food market) site is located right next door and we receive many guests for work reasons aswell many other guests stay at this hotel for different reasons given the quantity and quality of events in Barcelona. 

Likewise, the Natural Park of the Delta del Llobregat can be explored on foot or by bicycles, which can be rented at the hotel. They are very simple walks, without slopes, well indicated, their routes start five minutes from the hotel, highly recommended if you have a little time, if you like nature and if walking is not an inconvenience.

We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again.

Sincerely

"Be My Guest" department
Best Western Plus Hotel ALFA Aeropuerto 
Your hub between the Mediterranean destinations and home
owner_response.author: Be My Guest Department

data.text: Comfortable room, friendly, multilingual, professional staff (shout out to Manuel at the front desk for being extra kind and helpful. He let me practice my Spanish and made sure we told the shuttle driver the correct terminal). Great breakfast and shuttle that both start early (5:30, I believe)! We took the 6:30 am shuttle and were standing in line to check in at the airport at 6:45!
data.title: Great experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest

Thank you for your motivating review! We are very happy to read that your experience while staying with us was that good and our room, breakfast and shuttle was convenient for you. Good to know that Manuel, as always, was extra kind and helpful with his guests!

We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again.

Best regards,

"Be My Guest" department
Best Western Plus Hotel Alfa Aeropuerto
Your hub between the Mediterranean destinations and home
owner_response.author: Be My Guest Department
